SELECT ERROR_SEQ , ERROR_LOGGER , ERROR_LEVEL , ERROR_DATE , PROCESS_STATE , CASE WHEN PROCESS_STATE = 1 THEN '신규' WHEN PROCESS_STATE = 2 THEN '확인중' WHEN PROCESS_STATE = 3 THEN '처리중' END AS PROCESS_STATE_NM FROM STD_ERROR_LOG WHERE 1=1 AND PROCESS_STATE NOT IN 0 ORDER BY PROCESS_STATE ASC, ERROR_DATE DESC, ERROR_SEQ DESC

SELECT ERROR_SEQ , ERROR_LOGGER , ERROR_METHOD , ERROR_LOCATION , ERROR_DATE , ERROR_MESSAGE , ERROR_LEVEL , ERROR_THREAD , PROCESS_CONTENT , PROCESS_STATE , CASE WHEN PROCESS_STATE = 1 THEN '신규' WHEN PROCESS_STATE = 2 THEN '확인중' WHEN PROCESS_STATE = 3 THEN '처리중' END AS PROCESS_STATE_NM FROM STD_ERROR_LOG WHERE 1=1 AND ERROR_SEQ = #{error_seq}
